basicText.welcome1: Hi there! I'm Lara Your Friendly Insurance Assistant
basicText.welcome2: I can help you find the right service you're looking for
basicText.chooseService: But you need to tell me what brought you here first?
basicText.quoteOption: Got it! What you are looking to insure?
basicText.homeGreet1: Sure, We'll help you understand and customize the right home insurance coverage for you
basicText.homeGreet2: The best part is you can get a personalized home insurance for as little as $12/month
basicText.homeDateAsk: Please let me know from when you would require this?
basicText.propertyType: First up, whats your property type?
basicText.propertyLocation: okay, To Start I'll will need your address
basicText.askEmail: Do you have a preferred email address to send this quote?
basicText.autoGreet: Sure, I'm here to help you quickly and easily get car insurance that's right for you
basicText.autoDateAsk: Please let me know from when you would require this?
basicText.autoCarGreet: Great that's good choice for a SUV.
basicText.autoPurpose: Okay, what is the primary use of your car?
basicText.thanks: Thanks ! We have sent the details to you email and I will have my account manager connect to you ASAP.Have a great day!
basicText.autoname: Got it!! What is the make of your car?
basicText.policyNo: Sure, I will need your policy number to start reporting
basicText.ss: Plese enter security systems installed in your home ex camera, burglar alarm?
basicText.supportsoon: Thanks , our representative will reach to you as soon as possible.
basicText.dob: Hi joe!! could you please confirm your date of birth?
basicText.incidentImage: ok, upload image of the car
basicText.incidentLocation: Please give the location of accident
basicText.reload: Do you have any other Queries?
basicText.driving: Since when you have been driving this?
basicText.livesyou: Sounds Great, Who lives with you?
basicText.record: I have recorded your statement and will have our claim representative to contact you as quickly as possible.
basicText.better: Awesome, I just sent the Quote to your Email
basicText.reach: you can reach us at 133-900-34 for further queries
basicText.livesGreet: Great! Dryden got your back with your new policy
basicText.sysAlr: Choose security system installed in your Home
basicText.fillClaim: Have you filed any claims in the past 3 years?
basicText.name: We're almost Done, can I know your name?
basicText.prepare: Give me a moment, Let me prepare a quick quote for you
basicText.autoEmail: To which email would you like to send us the details to?
basicText.autoaskDate: To get started, I would require date of insurance?
basicText.autoGreet2: The best part is you can get a personalized car insurance for as little as $15/month
basicText.homeThanks: Have a great day! welcome back and happy to help.
basicText.havegreat1: Thanks ! We have sent the details to you email and I will have my account manager connect to you ASAP.
basicText.autofinal:
Well that's a great choice , we will have this quote sent to your email and if you would like to followup with our manager , please drop your contact no. 
 
 We will never share your contact number outside of our line of business.
